trans-unit.target: TEXT_DUNGEONFANFESUS_00000_HILDIBRAND_000_000<tab>Why, if it isn‘t a gathering of my most stalwart adventuring assistants! Or are you perchance participants in a grand convention being held in my honor?
TEXT_DUNGEONFANFESUS_00000_HILDIBRAND_000_001<tab>But never mind that! I have urgent need of your assistance with a case which took place in this golden garden of earthly delights!
TEXT_DUNGEONFANFESUS_00000_HILDIBRAND_000_002<tab>Quickly now, we must depart for Idyllshire! No time to explain why! Nor is there time to explain why I haven‘t time to explain! Go, go!
